1. Ho2 siau-sit.
我忽然ti7報紙看著一個好消息，非常e5歡喜，即時將hit張報紙用走e5提來到禮拜堂beh報林牧師。
Goa2 hut-jian5 ti7 po3-choa2 khoaN3 tioh8 chit8 e5 ho2 siau-sit, hui-siong5 e5 hoaN-hi2, chek-si5 chiong hit tiuN po3-choa2 eng7 chau2--e5 theh8 lai5 kau3 le2-pai3-tng5 beh po3 Lim5 Bok8-su.
「牧師，牧師！我已經有頭路lah。」
“Bok8-su, bok8-su! goa2 i2-keng u7 thau5-lou7 lah.”
「有影！An2-choaN2得著？」
“U7-iaN2! An2-choaN2 tit--tioh8?”
「你看這張報紙所刊e5，tu2-tu2是我這幾年來逐日teh夢想e5 條件。林牧師將hit張報紙提起來看，急徵業務員啟事：「正大化工有限公司，為著beh擴張業務，beh招募業務員10名，待遇每月2000箍以上，若是初中畢業程度，有意應徵者請寄履歷書附限時郵票寄來台南郵箱3856號，業務處收。若審查合格即通知面洽。」

“Li2 khoaN3 chit tiuN po3-choa2 sou2 khan e5,tu2-tu2 si7 goa2 chit kui2 ni5 lai5 tak8 jit8 teh bong7-siong2 e5 tiau5-kiaN7. Lim5 Bok8-su chiong hit tiuN po3-choa2 theh8 khi2 lai5 khoaN3, Kip-teng giap8-bu7-oan5 khe2-su7:“Cheng3-tai7 Hoa3-kang Iu2-han7 Kong-si, ui7 tioh8 beh khok-tiong giap8-bu7, beh chiau-bou7 giap8-bu7-oan5 10 mia5, thai7-gu7 mui2 geh8 2000 khou i2-siong7, na7 si7 Chhou-tiong pit-giap8 theng5-tou7, iu2 i3 eng3-teng chia2 chhiaN2 kia3 li2-lek8-su hu3 han7-si5 iu5-phio3 kia3 lai5 Tai5-lam5 iu5-siuN 3856 ho7, giap8-bu7-chhu3 siu. Na7 sim2-cha hap8-keh chek thong-ti bian7 hiap8.”
「我看這個啟事有淡薄giau5疑 e5所在，近來chhe7職業m7是hiah-nih簡單e5事，那裏有初中畢業會thang趁2000箍e5待遇？Che kiam2-chhai2是teh騙人也無的確。」「Che是公開刊ti7報紙，那會騙人e5理由？」我應。

“Goa2 khoaN3 chit e5 khe2-su7 u7 tam7-poh8 giau5-gi5 e5 sou2-chai7, kun7-lai5 chhe7 chit-giap8 m7 si7 hiah-nih kan2-tan e5 su7, na2-li2 u7 chhou-tiong pit-giap8 oe7 thang than3 2000 khou e5 thai7-gu7? Che kiam2-chhai2 si7 teh phian3 lang5 ia7 bo5 tek-khak.” “Che si7 kong-khai khan ti7 po3-choa2, na2 oe7 phian3 lang5 e5 li2-iu5?”Goa2 in3.
「文生，我想你m7-thang一心一意teh欣慕beh去市內食頭路，你雖然無職業，m7-ku2你有幾分田園，你若扑拚專心作穡，我看無較輸去市內chiah著，何況你e5父母已經年老，也無愛你離開in，tiam3厝好好奉待序大人，上帝一定會祝福你e5工作。」

“Bun5-seng , goa2 siuN7 li2 m7-thang chit8-sim-chit8-i3 teh him-bou7 beh khi3 chhi7-lai7 chiah8 thau5-lou7, li2 sui-jian5 bo5 chit-giap8, m7-ku2 li2 u7 kui2 hun chhan5-hng5, li2 na7 phah-piaN3 choan-sim choh-sit, goa2 khoaN3 bo5 khah su khi3 chhi7-lai7 chiah tioh8, ho5-hong3 li2 e5 pe7-bu2 i2-keng ni5-lau7, ia7 bo5 ai3 li2 li7-khui in, tiam3 chhu3 ho2-ho2 hong7-thai7 si7-toa7 lang5, Siong7-te3 it-teng7 oe7 chiok-hok li2 e5 kang-chok.”
「我都是hou7阮老父chiah e5 m7成田園縛tiam3這個古井內chiah著淒慘；這個時代e5青年若boe7曉想莫bun3出去外面扑拚，tiam3 chia萬世boe7出頭天。」

“Goa2 to si7 hou7 goan2 lau7-pe7 chiah e5 m7-chiaN5 chhan5-hng5 pak8 tiam3 chit e5 kou2-chiN2 lai7 chiah tioh8 chhiN-chham2; chit e5 si5-tai7 e5 chheng-lian5 na7 boe7-hiau2 siuN7 boh8 bun3 chhut khi3 goa7-bin7 phah-piaN3, tiam3 chia ban7-si3 boe7 chhut-thau5-thiN.”
「總是tiam3鄉村ma7有鄉村e5好，tiam3都市ma7有都市e5 bai2，無一定著攏ti7市內，你看咱教會e5呂長老、李執事，in kiam2 m7是tiam3山nih扑拚，經營田園，ma7是hou7上帝大祝福。也去市內e5人ma7有真濟轉來 teh叫苦連天。」

“Chong2-si7 tiam3 hiong-chhoan ma7 u7 hiong-chhoan e5 ho2, tiam3 tou-chhi7 ma7 u7 tou-chhi7 e5 bai2, bo5 it-teng7 tioh8 long2 ti7 chhi7-lai7, li2 khoaN3 lan2 kau3-hoe7 e5 Lu7 TiuN2-lo2, Li2 Chip-su7, in kiam2 m7 si7 tiam3 soaN--nih phah-piaN3, keng-eng5 chhan5-hng5, ma7 si7 hou7 Siong7-te3 toa7 chiok-hok. Ia7 khi3 chhi7-lai7 e5 lang5 ma7 u7 chin choe7 tng2 lai5 teh kio3 khou2 lian5-thian.”

「無影ou5！若有頭路較講ma7 beh來去市內，你看吳長老、黃執事，in若無去市內，永遠都是teh kiah8鋤頭，koh看阿杉哥、福財兄，一下去市內，穿插攏紳士起來，以前e5草地song5味攏無去。」「M7-ku2有一項你m7知影，」林牧師講，「Chia e5人ti7 咱教會是真熱心服事上帝，禮拜赴聚會，做教會e5工非常扑拚，雖然生活無thang好，若是心靈真快樂teh過日，今ti7市內，照我所知，有真濟人e5信仰已經漸漸冷淡，甚至有e5已經離開上帝，無teh做禮拜lah，in boe7堪得受hia e5罪惡引誘，親像穆長老，茂祥兄…攏已經失去信心，變做魔鬼e5奴才lah。」

“Bo5-iaN2 ou5! Na7 u7 thau5-lou7 khah kong2 ma7 beh lai5-khi3 chhi7-lai7, li2 khoaN3 Gou5 TiuN2-lo2, Ng5 Chip-su7, in na7 bo5 khi3 chhi7-lai7, eng2-oan2 to si7 teh kiah8 ti5-thau5, koh khoaN3 A-sam ko, Hok-chai5 hiaN, chit8-e7 khi3 chhi7-lai7, chheng7-chhah long2 sin-su7 khi2--lai5, i2-cheng5 e5 chhau2-toe7 song5 bi7 long2 bo5--khi3.” “M7-ku2 u7 chit8 hang7 li2 m7 chai-iaN2,” Lim5 Bok8-su kong2, “Chia e5 lang5 ti7 lan2 kau3-hoe7 si7 chin jiat8-sim hok8-sai7 Siong7-te3, le2-pai3 hu3 chu7-hoe7, choe3 kau3-hoe7 e5 kang hui-siong5 phah-piaN3, sui-jian5 seng-oah8 bo5 thang ho2, na7 si7 sim-leng5 chin khoai3-lok8 teh ke3-jit8, taN ti7 chhi7-lai7, chiau3 goa2 sou2 chai, u7 chin choe7 lang5 e5 sin3-giong2 i2-keng chiam7-chiam7 leng2-tam7, sim7-chi3 u7 e5 i2-keng li7-khui Siong7-te3, bo5 teh choe3 le2-pai3 lah, in boe7 kham-tit siu7 hia e5 choe7-ok in2-iu7, chhin-chhiuN7 Bok8 TiuN2 lo2, Bou7-siong5 hiaN... long2 i2-keng sit-khi3 sin3-sim, piN3 choe3 Mou5-kui2 e5 lou5-chai5 lah.”
「你講an2-ni是事實，不過he是在人e5 信心有堅定無？我是hou7我無機會thang去hia，若這擺主幫贊我會thang來去就職，一定beh ti7附近e5教會加倍熱心來為主做工。」

“Li2 kong2 an2-ni si7 su7-sit8, put-ko3 he si7 chai7 lang5 e5 sin3-sim u7 kian-teng7 bo5? Goa2 si7 hou7 goa2 bo5 ki-hoe7 thang khi3 hia, na7 chit pai2 Chu2 pang-chan7 goa2 oe7 thang lai5-khi3 chiu7-chit, it-teng7 beh ti7 hu3-kun7 e5 kau3-hoe7 ka-pe7 jiat8-sim lai5 ui7 Chu2 choe3 kang.”

「人攏會軟弱，你著知影市內e5罪惡，詭譎是咱想boe7到e5，特別犯罪e5誘惑實在hou7咱可怕。」林牧師講到chia koh 坦白ka7我講，「我知影你是一個熱心可取e5青年，ti7咱教會擔當T.K.C.會長，主日學教員要緊e5職，這間弱小e5教會上帝有大欠用你ti7 chia做工，我想為著你e5父母，為著咱教會e5緣故，做好放棄到都市e5念頭，努力ti7家己e5職場，我相信上帝會祝福你成功e5一日。何況報紙teh報這個消息，m7知是真抑是一場e5騙局？假使若是真e5，kan-ta市內人ma7引到無份，kiam2有法度thang著咱？」

“Lang5 long2 oe7 loan2-jiok8, li2 tioh8 chai-iaN2 chhi7-lai7 e5 choe7-ok, khui2-khiat si7 lan2 siuN7 boe7 kau3 e5, tek8-piat8 hoan7-choe7 e5 iu2-hek8 sit8-chai7 hou7 lan2 kho2-phaN3.” Lim5 Bok8-su kong2 kau3 chia koh than2-peh8 ka7 goa2 kong2, “Goa2 chai-iaN2 li2 si7 chit8 e5 jiat8-sim kho2-chhu2 e5 chheng-lian5, ti7 lan2 kau3-hoe7 tam-tng T.K.C. hoe7-tiuN2, Chu2-jit8-oh8 kau3-oan5 iau3-kin2 e5 chit, chit keng jiok8-siau2 e5 kau3-hoe7 Siong7-te3 u7 toa7 khiam3-eng7 li2 ti7 chia choe3 kang, goa2 siuN7 ui7 tioh8 li2 e5 pe7-bu2, ui7 tioh8 lan2 kau3-hoe7 e5 ian5-kou3, choe3 ho2 hong3-khi3 kau3 tou-chhi7 e5 liam7-thau5, lou2-lek8 ti7 ka-ki7 e5 chit tiuN5, goa2 siong-sin3 Siong7-te3 oe7 chiok-hok li2 seng5-kong e5 chit8 jit8. Ho5-hong3 po3-choa2 teh po3 chit e5 siau-sit, m7 chai si7 chin a2 si7 chit8 tiuN5 e5 phian3-kiok8? Ka2-su2 na7 si7 chin--e5, kan-ta chhi7-lai7 lang5 ma7 in2 kau3 bo5 hun7, kiam2 u7 hoat-tou7 thang tioh8 lan2?”
「是，所以我m7-thang失去這個機會，著來去試看mai7，上帝若無ai3我去，這個事就boe7成。」
“Si7, sou2-i2 goa2 m7-thang sit-khi3 chit e5 ki-hoe7, tioh8 lai5-khi3 chhi3 khoaN3 mai7, Siong7-te3 na7 bo5 ai3 goa2 khi3, chit e5 su7 chiu7 boe7 seng5.”

我tui3禮拜堂出來，那行那想，che是千載一遇e5機會，我無論如何m7-thang hou7牧師e5話改變我e5念頭，牧師攏是teh考慮伊家己e5立場，當然無ai3我去別位，有影我若走，教會已經無人thang koh活動。總是伊攏無考慮我 e5問題，一個無讀冊e5人尚且無ai3 tiam3田庄lah，何況我這個高中畢業生kiam2 m7是koh較著趁機會nng3入市內mah？我ti7 hia ma7是會thang為主熱心來利益教會，教會是上帝e5，我若走，上帝自然會興起tu2好e5人撐起來，m7免掛慮這個事。

Goa2 tui3 le2-pai3-tng5 chhut--lai5, na2 kiaN5 na2 siuN7, che si7 chhian-chaiN2 it-gu7 e5 ki-hoe7, goa2 bo5-lun7 ju5-ho5 m7-thang hou7 bok8-su e5 oe7 kai2-pian3 goa2 e5 liam7-thau5, bok8-su long2 si7 teh kho2-lu7 i ka-ki7 e5 lip8-tiuN5, tong-jian5 bo5 ai3 goa2 khi3 pat8-ui7, u7 iaN2 goa2 na7 chau2, kau3-hoe7 i2-keng bo5 lang5 thang koh oah8-tang7. Chong2-si7 i long2 bo5 kho2-lu7 goa2 e5 bun7-toe5, chit8 e5 bo5 thak8-chheh e5 lang5 siong7-chhiaN2 bo5 ai3 tiam3 chhan5-chng lah, ho5-hong3 goa2 chit e5 Ko-tiong pit-giap8-seng kiam2 m7 si7 koh-khah tioh8 than3 ki-hoe7 nng3 jip8 chhi7-lai7 mah? Goa2 ti7 hia ma7 si7 oe7 thang ui7 Chu2 jiat8-sim lai5 li7-ek kau3-hoe7, kau3-hoe7 si7 Siong7-te3 e5, goa2 na7 chau2, Siong7-te3 chu7-jian5 oe7 heng-khi2 tu2-ho2 e5 lang5 theN3--khi2-lai5, m7 bian2 khoa3-lu7 chit e5 su7.
我轉來厝，tui3屜仔開起來，提hit張已經寫好聽候真久e5履歷書，隨時走來郵局買一張限時e5批long5 kap買一張2.50 e5郵票，kap履歷書lok ti7批long5內，就an2-ni 帶著滿懷e5 信心，lok落去郵筒，我攏無講 hou7父母知影，何必著hou7 in知影。

Goa2 tng2 lai5 chhu3, tui3 thoah-a2 khui--khi2-lai5, theh8 hit tiuN i2-keng sia2 ho2 theng3-hau7 chin ku2 e5 li2-lek8-su, sui5-si5 chau2 lai5 iu5-kiok8 boe2 chit8 tiuN han7-si5 e5 phe-long5 kap boe2 chit8 tiuN 2.50 e5 iu5-phio3, kap li2-lek8-su lok ti7 phoe-long5 lai7, chiu7 an2-ni toa3 tioh8 moa2-hoai5 e5 sin3-sim, lok loh8 khi3 iu5-tang5, goa2 long2 bo5 kong2 hou7 pe7-bu2 chai-iaN2, ho5-pit tioh8 hou7 in chai-iaN2.
